name: Constellation Vase
description: The Constellation Dark Vase is a beautiful whimsical piece with its celestial inspired roots. Handmade with Shagreen/Pen Shell, bronze-patina brass, it supports water. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Inspired by her parents, Kifu incorporates handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones.
